# n8n_variables (Data Source)

Fetches a list of n8n variables with optional filtering

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Optional

- `project_id` (String) Filter variables by project ID
- `state` (String) Filter variables by state (e.g., 'empty')

### Read-Only

- `variables` (Attributes List) List of variables (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--variables))

<a id="nestedatt--variables"></a>

### Nested Schema for `variables`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Variable identifier
- `key` (String) Variable key
- `project_id` (String) Project ID the variable belongs to
- `type` (String) Variable type
- `value` (String, Sensitive) Variable value
